mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.unified_id , t1.device_name , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.secret_level , t1.is_safety_production , t1.allot_proc_id , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from allot_assets t1 where t1.allot_proc_id = #{pid}

select t1.id , t1.unified_id , t1.device_name , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.secret_level , t1.is_safety_production , t1.allot_proc_id , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from allot_assets t1
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.UNIFIED_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unifiedId}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceName}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_MODEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceModel}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_SPEC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceSpec}),'%')
and t1.MANUFACTURER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.manufacturerId}),'%')
and t1.SECRET_LEVEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.secretLevel}),'%')
and t1.IS_SAFETY_PRODUCTION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isSafetyProduction}),'%')
and t1.ALLOT_PROC_ID =#{bean.allotProcId}
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute03}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute04}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute05}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute06}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute07}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute08}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute09}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute10}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute11}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute12}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_16 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute16}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_17 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute17}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_18 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute18}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_19 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute19}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_21 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute21}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_22 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute22}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_23 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute23}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_24 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute24}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_25 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute25}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_26 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute26}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_27 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute27}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_28 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute28}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_29 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute29}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_30 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute30}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.device_name desc

select t1.id , t1.unified_id , t1.device_name , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.secret_level , t1.is_safety_production , t1.allot_proc_id , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from (select * from allot_assets t where t.ALLOT_PROC_ID= #{bean.allotProcId}) t1
or t1.ID =#{bean.id}
or t1.UNIFIED_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unifiedId}),'%')
or t1.DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceName}),'%')

or t1.ATTRIBUTE_28 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute28}),'%')
or t1.ATTRIBUTE_29 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute29}),'%')
or t1.ATTRIBUTE_30 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute30}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.device_name desc

select t1.id , t1.unified_id , t1.device_name , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.secret_level , t1.is_safety_production , t1.allot_proc_id , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from allot_assets t1 where t1.id = #{id}

id,
unified_id,
device_name,
device_model,
device_spec,
manufacturer_id,

attribute_22,

attribute_28,
attribute_29,
attribute_30,
